name: Burial Ground (DEMO)
description:
Burial Ground 1.0 

You just closed the bar,  it's raining and you're ready to go home.  But the sounds of the dead......won't let you.  Fight hordes of zombies as Delores Galore in this zombie horror game taking place in New Orleans

Development Status -- Currently in production

This is a short playable demo meant to test out bugs and kinks.

  Give it a whirl and feel free to give feedback in the comments section!

If you like the game please do not hesitate to donate to the project.  Would love to eventually turn this into a full game and could use any support we can get.

Follow us:

Instagram @chambergamez

Youtube  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzVzPUkuJfB_Py6_pDahGKQ

Keyboard controls:

Left click - Shoot

Left shift - Sprint

H - Heal

Spacebar - Jump

Right click - pickup/open doors

R - Reload

F - Kick

(If Weapon Equipped)

2 - Primary Weapon

1 - Secondary Weapon

3  - Melee Weapon
